misalignments.reasoning: Statistics Bar is completely missing from dashboard. Spec requires three metrics displayed horizontally (Total tasks count, Completed tasks count, Completion percentage) using cards/boxes for visual separation. Dashboard only shows TaskInput and TaskList with no statistics display.

Client-side password validation is completely absent from registration form. Spec requires password minimum 6 characters validation on both client and server. Register page validates name and email format client-side, but has no password length validation - only HTML5 'required' attribute exists.
